tool_description: Generate random Shakespeare quotes, names, insults, lorem ipsum etc. Translate normal English to Shakespeare English.
name: Shakespeare
title: Shakespeare

api_list.name: /shakespeare/generate/lorem-ipsum
/shakespeare/generate/name
/shakespeare/translate
api_list.description: Translate from English to Shakespeare English.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Text to translate to Shakespeare English.

api_list.name: /shakespeare/generate/insult
/shakespeare/quote
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://shakespeare1.p.rapidapi.com/shakespeare/quote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shakespeare1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://shakespeare1.p.rapidapi.com/shakespeare/quote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shakespeare1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
